description:
Keroro has the brilliant plan of turning toilets into Transformers in order to invade.  Naturally, nothing can go wrong, such as a robot uprising.  And then Kululu seems to have adopted... a puppy?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Invasion Plan, Toilet! / Kururu and the Puppy
トイレ 今,立ち上がるとき! / クルル と 子犬
